original_text: But Paul did not think that this was right. He said to Barnabas, ‘John Mark did not remain with us until we had finished our work. He left us when we were in Pamphylia.’
korean_text: 바울은 밤빌리아에서 자기들을 떠나 함께 일하러 가지 아니한 자를 데리고 가는 것이 옳지 않다 하여

sentences.original_text: But Paul did not think that this was right.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 바울은 이것이 옳다고 생각하지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: 'John Mark did not remain with us
sentences.korean_translation: 요한 마가는 우리와 함께 머물지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: until we had finished our work.
He left us when we were in Pamphylia.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리가 밤빌리아에 있을 때 우리를 떠났습니다.'
